title: Development of the existing amenity: Where a building on a site comprises an existing amenity, the development of such land shall necessarily comprise minimum BUA equal to the existing amenity
clause_text: Development of the existing amenity: Where a building on a site comprises an existing amenity, the development of such land shall necessarily comprise minimum BUA equal to the existing amenity. Any balance permissible BUA, thereafter, may be put to use in conformity with development otherwise permissible in these Regulations.
section: Development of the existing amenity/reservation/partly existing amenity/partly reserved/amenity Plot:
